   306â†’

   311â†’    finally:

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
è·¨å¹³å°è·¯å¾„è¿ç§»å·¥å…· - Windows åˆ° macOS

é—®é¢˜ï¼šä» Windows è¿ç§»çš„é¡¹ç›®èµ„äº§åŒ…ä¸­ï¼Œæ•°æ®åº“å­˜å‚¨çš„è·¯å¾„æ˜¯ Windows æ ¼å¼çš„ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œ
ä¾‹å¦‚ "E:/ã€Šç•ªèŒ„ç„å¹»ã€‹é¡¹ç›®èµ„äº§åŒ…/images/img_xxx.png"
è¿™äº›è·¯å¾„åœ¨ macOS ä¸Šæ— æ³•è¯†åˆ«ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´è§†é¢‘çš„å‚è€ƒå›¾æ— æ³•æ˜¾ç¤ºã€‚

è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š
1. å°† parameters JSON ä¸­çš„ first_frame, last_frame, image_path è·¯å¾„ä» Windows ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
   è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå½“å‰ä»“åº“æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ­£ç¡®ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„
2. åŒæ—¶ç¡®ä¿ file_path å’Œ thumbnail_path ä½¿ç”¨æ­£ç¡®æ ¼å¼

ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•:
    python migrate_win_to_mac_paths.py /path/to/project/asset/folder
"""

import sqlite3
import json
import os
import sys
import re
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from datetime import datetime


def find_image_in_repo(filename: str, repo_root: Path) -> str | None:
    """
    åœ¨ä»“åº“ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒ¹é…çš„å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶

    Args:
        filename: å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶å (å¦‚ img_fc451514_1.png)
        repo_root: ä»“åº“æ ¹ç›®å½•

    Returns:
        ç›¸å¯¹äºä»“åº“æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¿”å› None
    """
    # æœç´¢ images ç›®å½•
    images_dir = repo_root / "images"
    if images_dir.exists():
        target = images_dir / filename
        if target.exists():
            return f"images/{filename}"

    # æœç´¢ references/images ç›®å½•
    ref_images_dir = repo_root / "references" / "images"
    if ref_images_dir.exists():
        target = ref_images_dir / filename
        if target.exists():
            return f"references/images/{filename}"

    return None


def extract_filename_from_windows_path(win_path: str) -> str | None:
    """
    ä» Windows è·¯å¾„ä¸­æå–æ–‡ä»¶å

    ä¾‹å¦‚: "E:/ã€Šç•ªèŒ„ç„å¹»ã€‹é¡¹ç›®èµ„äº§åŒ…/images/img_fc451514_1.png" -> "img_fc451514_1.png"
    """
    if not win_path:
        return None
    # åŒæ—¶å¤„ç†æ­£æ–œæ å’Œåæ–œæ 
    return Path(win_path.replace('\\', '/')).name


def convert_windows_path(win_path: str, repo_root: Path) -> str | None:
    """
    å°† Windows ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„è½¬æ¢ä¸ºä»“åº“å†…çš„æ­£ç¡®è·¯å¾„

    Args:
        win_path: Windows æ ¼å¼çš„è·¯å¾„
        repo_root: å½“å‰ä»“åº“æ ¹ç›®å½•

    Returns:
        è½¬æ¢åçš„ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ— æ³•è½¬æ¢è¿”å› None
    """
    if not win_path:
        return None

    # æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ Windows è·¯å¾„
    is_windows_path = (
        re.match(r'^[A-Za-z]:', win_path) or  # å¦‚ E:/ æˆ– C:\
        win_path.startswith('\\\\')  # UNC è·¯å¾„
    )

    if is_windows_path:
        # æå–æ–‡ä»¶å
        filename = extract_filename_from_windows_path(win_path)
        if filename:
            # åœ¨ä»“åº“ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
            rel_path = find_image_in_repo(filename, repo_root)
            if rel_path:
                # è¿”å›ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
                return str(repo_root / rel_path)
        return None

    # å¦‚æœå·²ç»æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆè·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if os.path.exists(win_path):
        return win_path

    # å°è¯•ä½œä¸ºç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„å¤„ç†
    full_path = repo_root / win_path.lstrip('/\\')
    if full_path.exists():
        return str(full_path)

    return None


def find_video_thumbnail(video_id: str, repo_root: Path) -> str | None:
    """
    æŸ¥æ‰¾è§†é¢‘ç¼©ç•¥å›¾æ–‡ä»¶

    æ”¯æŒå¤šç§å‘½åæ ¼å¼:
    - thumbnails/vid_xxx_thumbnail.jpg (Windows å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼)
    - thumbnails/videos/vid_xxx_thumb.jpg (æ ‡å‡†æ ¼å¼)
    """
    # Windows å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼: thumbnails/vid_xxx_thumbnail.jpg
    thumb1 = repo_root / "thumbnails" / f"{video_id}_thumbnail.jpg"
    if thumb1.exists():
        return str(thumb1)

    # æ ‡å‡†æ ¼å¼: thumbnails/videos/vid_xxx_thumb.jpg
    thumb2 = repo_root / "thumbnails" / "videos" / f"{video_id}_thumb.jpg"
    if thumb2.exists():
        return str(thumb2)

    return None


def find_video_file(video_id: str, repo_root: Path) -> str | None:
    """æŸ¥æ‰¾è§†é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶"""
    video_path = repo_root / "videos" / f"{video_id}.mp4"
    if video_path.exists():
        return str(video_path)
    return None


def migrate_record_paths(record: dict, repo_root: Path) -> tuple[dict, bool]:
    """
    è¿ç§»å•æ¡è®°å½•ä¸­çš„è·¯å¾„

    Returns:
        (ä¿®æ”¹åçš„è®°å½•, æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å˜åŒ–)
    """
    modified = False
    record_id = record.get('id', '')

    # å¤„ç† parameters JSON
    params = record.get('parameters')
    if params:
        if isinstance(params, str):
            try:
                params = json.loads(params)
            except json.JSONDecodeError:
                params = {}

        params_modified = False

        # éœ€è¦è½¬æ¢çš„è·¯å¾„å­—æ®µ
        path_fields = ['first_frame', 'last_frame', 'image_path']

        for field in path_fields:
            old_path = params.get(field)
            if old_path and isinstance(old_path, str):
                new_path = convert_windows_path(old_path, repo_root)
                if new_path and new_path != old_path:
                    params[field] = new_path

                    print(f"    {field}: {old_path} -> {new_path}")

        if params_modified:
            record['parameters'] = json.dumps(params, ensure_ascii=False)
            modified = True

    # å¤„ç† file_path
    file_path = record.get('file_path')
    relative_path = record.get('relative_path', '')

    # æƒ…å†µ1: file_path ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œä» relative_path æ„å»º
    if not file_path and relative_path:
        # ç»Ÿä¸€å¤„ç†åæ–œæ

        if abs_path.exists():

    # æƒ…å†µ3: file_path æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
    elif file_path and not os.path.isabs(file_path):
        abs_path = repo_root / file_path.replace('\\', '/').lstrip('/')
        if abs_path.exists():
            record['file_path'] = str(abs_path)
            modified = True

    # å¤„ç† thumbnail_path
    thumbnail_path = record.get('thumbnail_path')

    # æƒ…å†µ1: thumbnail_path ä¸ºç©ºï¼ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾ç¼©ç•¥å›¾æ–‡ä»¶
    if not thumbnail_path and record_id:
        thumb = find_video_thumbnail(record_id, repo_root)
        if thumb:
            record['thumbnail_path'] = thumb
            print(f"    thumbnail_path: (ç©º) -> {thumb}")

    # æƒ…å†µ2: thumbnail_path å­˜åœ¨ä½†æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
    elif thumbnail_path and not os.path.isabs(thumbnail_path):
        abs_path = repo_root / thumbnail_path.replace('\\', '/').lstrip('/')
        if abs_path.exists():
            record['thumbnail_path'] = str(abs_path)

def migrate_database(db_path: Path, repo_root: Path, dry_run: bool = False) -> dict:
    """
    è¿ç§»æ•´ä¸ªæ•°æ®åº“ä¸­çš„è·¯å¾„

    Args:
        db_path: æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        repo_root: ä»“åº“æ ¹ç›®å½•
        dry_run: å¦‚æœä¸º Trueï¼Œåªé¢„è§ˆä¸ä¿®æ”¹

    Returns:
        ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯å­—å…¸
    """
    stats = {
        'total_records': 0,
        'video_records': 0,
        'modified_records': 0,
        'skipped_records': 0,
        'errors': []
    }

    conn = sqlite3.connect(str(db_path))
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    cursor = conn.cursor()

    try:
        # æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰è§†é¢‘è®°å½•
        cursor.execute("""
            SELECT id, content_type, file_path, relative_path, thumbnail_path, parameters, metadata
            FROM generations
            WHERE content_type = 'videos'
        """)

        records = cursor.fetchall()
        stats['total_records'] = len(records)

        for row in records:
            stats['video_records'] += 1
            record_id = row['id']

            print(f"\nå¤„ç†è®°å½•: {record_id}")

            # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—å…¸
            record = dict(row)

            try:
                modified_record, was_modified = migrate_record_paths(record, repo_root)

                if was_modified:
                    stats['modified_records'] += 1

                    if not dry_run:
                        # æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“
                        cursor.execute("""
                            UPDATE generations
                            SET file_path = ?, thumbnail_path = ?, parameters = ?
                            WHERE id = ?
                        """, (
                            modified_record['file_path'],
                            modified_record['thumbnail_path'],
                            modified_record['parameters'],
                            record_id
                        ))
                        print(f"    âœ“ å·²æ›´æ–°")
                    else:
                        print(f"    [é¢„è§ˆæ¨¡å¼] å°†è¦æ›´æ–°")
                else:
                    stats['skipped_records'] += 1
                    print(f"    - æ— éœ€ä¿®æ”¹")

            except Exception as e:
                stats['errors'].append(f"{record_id}: {str(e)}")
                print(f"    âœ— é”™è¯¯: {e}")

        if not dry_run:
            conn.commit()
            print("\næ•°æ®åº“å·²æäº¤æ›´æ”¹")

    except Exception as e:
        conn.rollback()
        stats['errors'].append(f"æ•°æ®åº“é”™è¯¯: {str(e)}")
        print(f"\næ•°æ®åº“é”™è¯¯: {e}")
    finally:
        conn.close()

    return stats


def backup_database(db_path: Path) -> Path:
    """åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å¤‡ä»½"""
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
    backup_path = db_path.parent / f"{db_path.stem}_backup_{timestamp}{db_path.suffix}"
    shutil.copy2(db_path, backup_path)
    return backup_path


def main():
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("ç”¨æ³•: python migrate_win_to_mac_paths.py <ä»“åº“è·¯å¾„> [--dry-run]")
        print("ç¤ºä¾‹: python migrate_win_to_mac_paths.py '/Users/user/Downloads/ã€Šç•ªèŒ„ç„å¹»ã€‹é¡¹ç›®èµ„äº§åŒ…'")
        sys.exit(1)

        print(f"é”™è¯¯: æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {db_path}")
        sys.exit(1)

    print(f"=" * 60)
    print(f"è·¨å¹³å°è·¯å¾„è¿ç§»å·¥å…· - Windows åˆ° macOS")
    print(f"=" * 60)
    print(f"ä»“åº“è·¯å¾„: {repo_path}")
    print(f"æ•°æ®åº“: {db_path}")
    print(f"æ¨¡å¼: {'é¢„è§ˆ' if dry_run else 'æ­£å¼è¿ç§»'}")
    print(f"=" * 60)

    if not dry_run:

    # æ‰§è¡Œè¿ç§»

    # æ‰“å°ç»Ÿè®¡
    print(f"\n{'=' * 60}")

    print(f"  - æ€»è®°å½•æ•°: {stats['total_records']}")
    print(f"  - è§†é¢‘è®°å½•: {stats['video_records']}")
    print(f"  - ä¿®æ”¹è®°å½•: {stats['modified_records']}")
    print(f"  - è·³è¿‡è®°å½•: {stats['skipped_records']}")

    if stats['errors']:
        print(f"  - é”™è¯¯æ•°: {len(stats['errors'])}")
        for err in stats['errors']:
            print(f"    Â· {err}")

    if dry_run:

        print(f"ç¡®è®¤æ— è¯¯åï¼Œè¯·å»æ‰ --dry-run å‚æ•°é‡æ–°è¿è¡Œ")


if __name__ == '__main__':

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºé…ç½®ç®¡ç†å™¨

æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€çš„é…ç½®ç®¡ç†æ¥å£ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé…ç½®çš„è¯»å–ã€ä¿å­˜å’ŒéªŒè¯
"""

import json
import os
import platform
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict


@dataclass
class WindowConfig:
    """çª—å£é…ç½®"""
    width: int = 1400
    height: int = 900
    min_width: int = 1024
    min_height: int = 600
    remember_size: bool = True
    remember_position: bool = True
    x: int = -1  # -1è¡¨ç¤ºå±…ä¸­
    y: int = -1  # -1è¡¨ç¤ºå±…ä¸­
    maximized: bool = False

   320â†’    framework_dir="$("$python_bin" -c 'import os, sysconfig; prefix=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORKPREFIX"); name=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORK"); print(os.path.join(prefix, name + ".framework") if prefix and name else "")' 2>/dev/null)"
   321â†’

   343â†’
   344â†’sign_app() {
   345â†’    echo "âœï¸ æ‰§è¡Œ ad-hoc ç­¾å..."
   346â†’    clean_app_metadata
   347â†’    if ! codesign --force --deep --options runtime --sign - "$FINAL_APP_PATH"; then
   348â†’        echo "âŒ codesign å¤±è´¥"

   356â†’        echo "â„¹ï¸ Gatekeeper ä»éœ€å³é”®â†’æ‰“å¼€æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œ 'sudo spctl --add \"$FINAL_APP_PATH\"' åå†è¿è¡Œï¼ˆæ­£å¸¸æç¤ºï¼‰"
   357â†’    fi
   358â†’    echo "âœ… ç­¾åä¸å±æ€§ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
   359â†’}
   360â†’
   361â†’package_release() {
   362â†’    mkdir -p "$RELEASE_DIR"
   363â†’    local release_app="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"
   364â†’    local release_zip="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip"
   365â†’
   366â†’    rm -rf "$release_app" "$release_zip"
   367â†’    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$release_app"
   368â†’    (cd "$RELEASE_DIR" && ditto -c -k --keepParent "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app" "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip")
   369â†’    echo "âœ… äº§ç‰©å·²è¾“å‡ºè‡³: $release_app"
   370â†’    echo "âœ… å‹ç¼©åŒ…: $release_zip"

   372â†’
   373â†’create_dmg() {

   400â†’    # å›¾æ ‡å¤„ç†ï¼šæ­£å¼ç‰ˆç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰ icnsï¼Œä½“éªŒç‰ˆä» PNG ç”Ÿæˆ
   401â†’    if [[ "$EDITION" == "official" ]]; then

   413â†’    build_app

   421â†’    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then

#!/bin/bash
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# é¸½æ¢¦AI - macOS æ‰“åŒ…è„šæœ¬ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒæ­£å¼ç‰ˆ / ä½“éªŒç‰ˆï¼‰

set -euo pipefail

APP_NAME="é¸½æ¢¦Godream"

SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(cd "$SCRIPT_DIR/../.." && pwd)"
PACKAGING_DIR="$SCRIPT_DIR"
BUILD_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/build"
DIST_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dist"
DMG_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dmg_build"
RESOURCES_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/edition/resources"
RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR=""
TEMP_ICON_DIR=""

detect_version() {
    python3 -c "import runpy, pathlib; version_path=pathlib.Path(r'''$PROJECT_ROOT''')/'version.py'; data=runpy.run_path(str(version_path)) if version_path.exists() else {}; print(data.get('__version__','0.0.0'))"
}

APP_VERSION="$(detect_version)"

usage() {
    cat <<EOF
ç”¨æ³•: $0 [é€‰é¡¹]
é€‰é¡¹:
  --edition <official|trial>  æŒ‡å®šæ‰“åŒ…ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ officialï¼‰
  --clean-only               ä»…æ¸…ç†æ„å»ºç›®å½•åé€€å‡º
  --no-dmg                   ä¸ç”Ÿæˆ DMG å®‰è£…åŒ…
  --help                     æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ¬å¸®åŠ©
EOF
}

EDITION="official"
CREATE_DMG_FLAG=true
CLEAN_ONLY=false

while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    case "$1" in
        --edition)
            EDITION="${2:-official}"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --clean-only)
            CLEAN_ONLY=true
            shift
            ;;
        --no-dmg)
            CREATE_DMG_FLAG=false
            shift
            ;;
        --help)
            usage
            exit 0
            ;;
        *)
            echo "æœªçŸ¥é€‰é¡¹: $1"
            usage
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
done

case "$EDITION" in
    official)
        EDITION_LABEL="æ­£å¼ç‰ˆ"
        CONFIG_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api_production.py"
        # ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰é«˜æ¸… icns å›¾æ ‡ï¼ˆ674Kï¼Œå¤šå°ºå¯¸ï¼‰

APP_PACKAGE_NAME="${APP_NAME}_v${APP_VERSION}_${EDITION_LABEL}"
FINAL_APP_PATH="$DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"

ensure_command() {
    if ! command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å‘½ä»¤: $1"
        exit 1
    fi
}

check_requirements() {
    echo "ğŸ” æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒ..."
    if [[ "$OSTYPE" != "darwin"* ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ­¤è„šæœ¬ä»…æ”¯æŒåœ¨ macOS ä¸Šè¿è¡Œ"
        exit 1
    fi
    ensure_command python3
    ensure_command pip3
    ensure_command sips
    ensure_command iconutil
    ensure_command rsync

    if [[ "$(uname -m)" != "arm64" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ å½“å‰è„šæœ¬ä»…éªŒè¯è¿‡ Apple Silicon (arm64) å¹³å°ï¼ŒIntel è®¾å¤‡å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°å…¼å®¹æ€§é—®é¢˜ã€‚"
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥é€šè¿‡"
}

install_dependencies() {
    if [[ "${SKIP_PIP_INSTALL:-0}" == "1" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ è·³è¿‡ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…ï¼ˆæ£€æµ‹åˆ° SKIP_PIP_INSTALL=1ï¼‰"
        return
    fi

    echo "ğŸ“¦ å®‰è£…æ‰“åŒ…ä¾èµ–..."
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT"
    pip3 install --upgrade py2app dmgbuild >/dev/null

    if [[ -f "requirements_py313.txt" ]]; then
        pip3 install -r requirements_py313.txt >/dev/null
    elif [[ -f "requirements.txt" ]]; then
        pip3 install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null
    fi

    pip3 install pillow PyQt5 >/dev/null
    echo "âœ… ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…å®Œæˆ"
}

clean_build() {
    echo "ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†æ„å»ºç›®å½•..."
    rm -rf "$BUILD_DIR" "$DIST_DIR" "$DMG_DIR"
    echo "âœ… æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆ"
}

prepare_config() {
    if [[ ! -f "$CONFIG_SOURCE" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶: $CONFIG_SOURCE"
        exit 1
    fi

    cp "$CONFIG_SOURCE" "$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py"
    echo "âœ… å·²åˆ‡æ¢é…ç½®åˆ°: $(basename "$CONFIG_SOURCE")"
}

prepare_platform_resources() {
    if [[ ! -d "$RESOURCES_DIR" ]]; then
        return
    fi
    local backup_parent
    backup_parent="$(mktemp -d)"
    RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR="$backup_parent/resources_backup"
    mkdir -p "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"
    rsync -a "$RESOURCES_DIR/" "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ >/dev/null 2>&1

    local stage_parent
    stage_parent="$(mktemp -d)"
    local stage_dir="$stage_parent/resources"
    mkdir -p "$stage_dir"
    rsync -a "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ "$stage_dir"/ >/dev/null 2>&1

    # ä»…ä¿ç•™ macOS æ‰€éœ€äºŒè¿›åˆ¶
    if [[ -d "$stage_dir/bin/windows" ]]; then
        rm -rf "$stage_dir/bin/windows"
    fi

    rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
    mv "$stage_dir" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
    rm -rf "$stage_parent"
}

restore_platform_resources() {
    if [[ -n "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" && -d "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" ]]; then
        local backup_parent
        backup_parent="$(dirname "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR")"
        rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
        mv "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
        rm -rf "$backup_parent" 2>/dev/null || true
        RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR=""
    fi
}

cleanup_on_exit() {

    rm -rf "$TEMP_ICON_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true
}

generate_app_icon() {
    local source_png="$ICON_SOURCE_PNG"
    if [[ ! -f "$source_png" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å›¾æ ‡æºæ–‡ä»¶: $source_png"
        exit 1
    fi

    if ! python3 -m icnsutil --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ æœªå®‰è£… icnsutilï¼Œè¯·å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œ: python3 -m pip install icnsutil"
        exit 1
    fi

    TEMP_ICON_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    local iconset_dir="$TEMP_ICON_DIR/Iconset"
    mkdir -p "$iconset_dir"

    declare -a base_sizes=(16 32 128 256 512)
    local -a compose_args=()
    for size in "${base_sizes[@]}"; do
        local base_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}.png"
        sips -z "$size" "$size" "$source_png" --out "$base_file" >/dev/null
        compose_args+=("$base_file")

        local retina=$((size * 2))
        local retina_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}@2x.png"
        sips -z "$retina" "$retina" "$source_png" --out "$retina_file" >/dev/null
        compose_args+=("$retina_file")
    done

    if ! python3 -m icnsutil compose -f "$ICON_TARGET" "${compose_args[@]}"; then
        echo "âŒ icnsutil ç”Ÿæˆå›¾æ ‡å¤±è´¥: $ICON_TARGET"
        exit 1
    fi

    echo "âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ macOS å›¾æ ‡: $ICON_TARGET"
}

build_app() {
    echo "ğŸ”¨ å¼€å§‹æ„å»º ${EDITION_LABEL} ..."
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT"

    export GEMENG_APP_EDITION="$EDITION"
    export GEMENG_APP_NAME="$APP_NAME"
    export GEMENG_APP_VERSION="$APP_VERSION"
    export GEMENG_APP_BUNDLE_ID="$BUNDLE_ID"
    export GEMENG_APP_ICON="$ICON_TARGET"
    export ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
    export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="${MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET:-13.0}"

    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
    local build_status=0
    if [[ "$(uname -m)" == "arm64" ]]; then
        set +e
        arch -arm64 "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app
        build_status=$?
        set -e
    else
        "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app || build_status=$?
    fi
    if [[ $build_status -ne 0 ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ py2app è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ $build_statusï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œï¼ˆæ—¥å¿—è§ä¸Šï¼‰"
    fi

    local built_app="$DIST_DIR/$APP_NAME.app"
    if [[ ! -d "$built_app" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ„å»ºäº§ç‰©: $built_app"
        exit 1
    fi

    rm -rf "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
    mv "$built_app" "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
    echo "âœ… åº”ç”¨æ„å»ºæˆåŠŸ: $FINAL_APP_PATH"
}

fix_app_permissions() {
    echo "ğŸ”§ ä¿®å¤æƒé™..."
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.so" -exec chmod +x {} \;
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.dylib" -exec chmod +x {} \;
    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
        chmod +x "$binary"
    fi
    echo "âœ… æƒé™ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
}

verify_app() {
    echo "ğŸ” éªŒè¯åº”ç”¨ç»“æ„..."
    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Info.plist" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ Info.plist"
        exit 1
    fi
    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ä¸»æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶"
        exit 1
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç»“æ„éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡"
}

thin_binary() {
    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
        local archs
        archs="$(lipo -info "$binary" 2>/dev/null || true)"
        echo "â„¹ï¸ å½“å‰å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ¶æ„: $archs"
        echo "[$(date '+%F %T')] $APP_PACKAGE_NAME -> $archs" >> "$PROJECT_ROOT/thin_binary.log"
        if [[ "$archs" == *"Non-fat"* ]]; then
            echo "âœ… å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶å·²æ˜¯å•æ¶æ„: $archs"
            return
        fi
        if [[ "$archs" == *"arm64"* ]]; then
            echo "â†”ï¸ å»é™¤å¤šä½™æ¶æ„: $archs"
            lipo "$binary" -thin arm64 -output "${binary}.arm64"
            mv "${binary}.arm64" "$binary"
        fi
    fi
}

embed_python_runtime() {
    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
    local framework_dir
    framework_dir="$("$python_bin" -c 'import os, sysconfig; prefix=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORKPREFIX"); name=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORK"); print(os.path.join(prefix, name + ".framework") if prefix and name else "")' 2>/dev/null)"

    if [[ -z "$framework_dir" || ! -d "$framework_dir" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„ Python.frameworkï¼Œè·³è¿‡åµŒå…¥"
        return
    fi

    local framework_name
    framework_name="$(basename "$framework_dir")"
    local target_dir="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks/$framework_name"

    mkdir -p "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks"
    rm -rf "$target_dir"
    rsync -a "$framework_dir/" "$target_dir/" >/dev/null 2>&1
    echo "âœ… å·²åµŒå…¥ Python æ¡†æ¶: $framework_name"
}

clean_app_metadata() {
    echo "ğŸ§½ æ¸…ç†æ‰©å±•å±æ€§..."
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '.DS_Store' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '._*' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
    xattr -cr "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
}

sign_app() {
    echo "âœï¸ æ‰§è¡Œ ad-hoc ç­¾å..."
    clean_app_metadata
    if ! codesign --force --deep --options runtime --sign - "$FINAL_APP_PATH"; then
        echo "âŒ codesign å¤±è´¥"
        exit 1
    fi
    if ! codesign -vv "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ ç­¾åæ ¡éªŒå¤±è´¥"
        exit 1
    fi
    if ! spctl --assess -vv --type execute "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "â„¹ï¸ Gatekeeper ä»éœ€å³é”®â†’æ‰“å¼€æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œ 'sudo spctl --add \"$FINAL_APP_PATH\"' åå†è¿è¡Œï¼ˆæ­£å¸¸æç¤ºï¼‰"
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç­¾åä¸å±æ€§ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
}

package_release() {
    mkdir -p "$RELEASE_DIR"
    local release_app="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"
    local release_zip="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip"

    rm -rf "$release_app" "$release_zip"
    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$release_app"
    (cd "$RELEASE_DIR" && ditto -c -k --keepParent "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app" "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip")
    echo "âœ… äº§ç‰©å·²è¾“å‡ºè‡³: $release_app"
    echo "âœ… å‹ç¼©åŒ…: $release_zip"
}

create_dmg() {
    echo "ğŸ“¦ åˆ›å»º DMG..."
    mkdir -p "$DMG_DIR"
    rm -rf "$DMG_DIR"/*
    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$DMG_DIR/"
    ln -sf /Applications "$DMG_DIR/Applications"

    local dmg_path="$DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.dmg"
    rm -f "$dmg_path"

        -ov -format UDZO \

    echo "âœ… DMG åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆ: $dmg_path"
}

main() {
    if $CLEAN_ONLY; then
        clean_build
        exit 0
    fi

    check_requirements
    install_dependencies

    # å›¾æ ‡å¤„ç†ï¼šæ­£å¼ç‰ˆç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰ icnsï¼Œä½“éªŒç‰ˆä» PNG ç”Ÿæˆ
    if [[ "$EDITION" == "official" ]]; then

        # æ— éœ€ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒICON_TARGET å·²æŒ‡å‘ç°æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
    elif [[ "$EDITION" == "trial" ]]; then

    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then

    fi
    echo "ğŸ‘‰ æ³¨æ„ï¼šå½“å‰æ„å»ºä»…é’ˆå¯¹ Apple Silicon (arm64) è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ã€‚"
}

main "$@"
